name: Rounit Gambhir
about: Self-driven and motivated Entrepreneur with 7 years of experience and a proven track record of success and extraordinary achievements in building a company from a simple idea to a Multi-million Rupees business. Experienced in all aspects of business development, including finance, operations, technology, product development, business strategies, operation management, and marketing. Excellent communicator with great time management skills, and great teamwork abilities. Always looking out for people with the same drive as me.

experience.title: Founder, Owner
experience.description: â€¢  Responsible for developing a business plan and building a F&B brand from scratch for a niche product     amid the Covid-19 Pandemic.â€¢  Established a mission and vision; founded one and only company in the world t o produce this     product, managing the team that executes operations and responsible for their organizationâ€™s     performance and ability to meet its major goals.â€¢  Sales increased by 15% month over month, reaching 40 lakhs in 18 months, all while the country was      in lockdown. We sold our products to more than 2500 customers, with an average order value of      more than RS 1450.â€¢  Assembling a team that can bring their vision to life, overseeing critical aspects of the business, as well     as supporting staff and employees who are responsible for product execution and delivering the final     offering to the customer.â€¢  Accountable for any initial funding to get the business off the ground, applying for loans or financing,     applying for grants, seeking venture capital, or using their own personal assets to fund the initial     business costs until the company begins earning enough revenue to cover costs. â€¢  Doing market research about the demand and supply, with respect to the product or service,      analyzing various key components such as the profit margin, potential competitors, strengths, and      weaknesses of the business.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Responsible for developing a business plan and building a F&B brand from scratch for a niche product  amid the Covid-19 Pandemic.â€¢ Established a mission and vision; founded one and only company in the world t o produce this  product, managing the team that executes operations and responsible for their organizationâ€™s  performance and ability to meet its major goals.â€¢ Sales increased by 15% month over month, reaching 40 lakhs in 18 months, all while the country was  in lockdown. We sold our products to more than 2500 customers, with an average order value of  more than RS 1450.â€¢ Assembling a team that can bring their vision to life, overseeing critical aspects of the business, as well  as supporting staff and employees who are responsible for product execution and delivering the final  offering to the customer.â€¢ Accountable for any initial funding to get the business off the ground, applying for loans or financing,  applying for grants, seeking venture capital, or using their own personal assets to fund the initial  business costs until the company begins earning enough revenue to cover costs. â€¢ Doing market research about the demand and supply, with respect to the product or service,  analyzing various key components such as the profit margin, potential competitors, strengths, and  weaknesses of the business.

experience.title: Head of Industrial Operations
experience.description: â€¢  Responsible for designing policies, overseeing customer service and implementing technology solutions.     An accountable leader with an analytical and strategic mind and a broad knowledge of the business.â€¢  Formulated business strategy with others in the executive team, design policies that align with overall     strategy and implemented efficient processes and standards.â€¢  Coordinated customer service operations and find ways to ensure customer retention; ensured     compliance with local and international laws (e.g. data protection). â€¢  Oversaw the implementation of technology solutions throughout the organization; managed contracts     and relations with customers, vendors, partners and other stakeholders.â€¢  Evaluated risk and lead quality assurance efforts and oversaw expenses and budgeting to help the     organization optimize costs and benefits.â€¢  Mentored and motivated teams to achieve productivity and engagement; Reported on operational      performance and suggest improvements.
